name: Fillet of John Dory with Olives, Capers and Rosemary
recipeIngredient: 1 anchovy fillet (cut lengthways into thin slivers),
1 1/2 pieces of sun dried tomato (roughly chopped),
2 very small vine ripened tomatoes (skinned, quartered and deseeded),
recipeInstructions: 2. Halve each fillet diagonally. Brush with olive oil and season. Place skin side up on a baking sheet.
3. Cut the potato into quarters and cook in boiling salted water until tender. Drain and return to the pan.
4. Add the anchovies, sun dried tomatoes, parsley, fresh tomatoes, olives capers, rosemary, and oil. Warm through and season.
5. Grill the fish for 3-4 minutes until barely cooked.
6. Pour the sauce over the fish.
